extension.name: uk.co.compucorp.certificate
extension.description: This extension allows sites administrator to configure certificates and attached them to entities, which can become downloadable when the configured condition for the certificate is met.
extension.comments: Supported CiviCRM versions : - A patched version of CiviCRM 5.39.1 (Download link: https://github.com/compucorp/civicrm-core/releases/download/5.39.1%2Bpatch.9c2c3b/civicrm-5.39.1+patch.9c2c3b.tar.gz)
